googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Rachelle Wickware
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Unbelievable experience! Will never call another plumber again. I called for what I thought was a small issue, they spent HOURS repairing a much more extensive issue. Constant contact throughout the process!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you very much. You were very kind to us the whole way and we really appreciate your business.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Graham Plumbing Repair

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jenn “Jenn Lee” Lee
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: We’ve hired Josh and his crew several times over the years and every time they have shown up on time, performed the work in a professional manner and very reasonably priced! Local guys who love their community and show that pride in their work.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much, we appreciate you and your business.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Graham Plumbing Repair

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Danielle Danner
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Amazing team! Quick,knowledgeable,and affordable service!Thank you Josh and Jake!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you very much. We appreciate your business and your review.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Graham Plumbing Repair

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Dee Nichols
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: One late night in November, I experienced that the pressure in my hot water line wasn’t the same as usual. Well after checking everywhere inside my home, I discovered that I indeed had an awful hot water line leak under my home in its crawl space. What’s a girl to do? Well call her granny of course! Granny gives me a referral to a Graham Plumbing, and I am so happy she did! I couldn’t praise the gentlemen that came to my rescue long enough. From start to finish there was no disappointment. Pricing is definitely reasonable. I will forever be calling Graham for all my plumbing needs. :)
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you Dee! It was a pleasure to work for you.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Graham Plumbing Repair

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kim Wolfe
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Graham Plumbing showed up about 2 hours after calling them. They completed a problem I was having with a new washing machine install. They were prompt, courteous, and very knowledgeable. I would use them again and I highly recommend them. Thanks for a job well done!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you very much. We appreciate your review!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Graham Plumbing Repair

- **Professional Certifications**: The business holds a license from the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, which requires professional certification[1].
aboutUs: Graham Plumbing is a trusted local plumbing company serving the Foley, Alabama area. Our team of highly skilled and licensed professionals specializes in providing comprehensive plumbing solutions, from routine maintenance to complex installations and repairs. With a deep understanding of the local community's needs, we offer tailored services that prioritize quality, efficiency, and customer satisfaction.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Reliable and expert plumbing services tailored to the unique needs of Foley residents and businesses.
sellingPoints: State-licensed and certified technicians with extensive knowledge of local plumbing codes and regulations.
Prompt and efficient service, with a commitment to minimizing disruptions and ensuring timely project completion.
Comprehensive range of plumbing services, from routine maintenance to complex installations and emergency repairs.
